::Aerotaur::
    "Ah (explitive)!!!!!"  Aerotaur feels the muzzle against his head and 
dives forward clutching the staff.  The blast cut a swath across the back of 
his skull and mech fluid spewed out at Burning Hammer's face.  He shuddered 
in pain and fired 8 shots at Burning Hammer with his left arm cannon.
